update_title: New: Audio State Indicator & Smart FPS
update_message:
What's New in 2.0.2:

• Audio State Indicator - New output indicator shows current audio processing state (Raw/Bit-Perfect, Resampling, DSP, Crossfade)

• Smart FPS Management - Auto-detects your display's refresh rate and lets you choose FPS cap (60/90/120/144/165Hz) within device limits

• Audio Info Sheet - Tap the output indicator to view detailed audio diagnostics including sample rate, bit depth, buffer status, and engine state

• Enhanced Crossfade Tracking - Detailed reasons when crossfade is skipped (gapless album, format mismatch, last track, etc.)

• Performance Improvements - Optimized frame rate handling for smoother UI on high refresh rate displays

• Bug fixes and stability improvements
